content:
During the last day, the Aviation of Defense forces has struck 8 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisreportedGeneral Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Divisions of rocket troops have led to:

  • 2 air defense agents,
  • 3 artillery means,
  • 1 of the enemy's ETS stations.

"At the same time, our warriors continue to be active in the occupation troops of losses in living strength and equipment, depleting the enemy along the entire line of combat collision," the message reads.

As reportedArmyinform, 60 captions took place on the front, almost half of them were in the Novopavlovsky direction.
title: Ukrainian rocket launchers struck by artillery and enemy reb stations in a day
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Divisions of missile troops ...
author: Army Inform
